title: Bronze 1 in my gold game
body: how is it that someone that is bronze 1 end up in a gold game. it doesn't make sense at all. its was pretty obvious that he was being boosted as his games went from feeding to solo carrying in the matter of a day. solo carried his team and dropped my mmr from gold 5 to silver 2 in one game, this doesn't make sense cause he was duo'ed with a silver 2 with silver 2 mmr mine was gold 5 so even then they still shouldn't have been in my game. I know there is nothing this company can do but why am I getting punished for my top lane feeding a bronze 1 (booster).  Pointless having a MMR system if its not in use properly.

replies.body: Your MMR will continue to tank unless you improve your play!
ur bronze I don't get why u would even bother commenting
your just salty you lost to some bronzies

Don't Git mad GIT GUD SON :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Youre mmr is just shit full stop, its not about shown mmr, its about hidden, and your hidden is crap. Youre hidden mmr is literally level with SIlver 2 so thats why youre with silver 2, youre mmr is 100 under what it should be, which is silver 2, not gold 5.
lol I just got off a 7-8 game winstreak in solo/duo my mmr couldn't have been that bad
